import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state= { age_value: '', sex_value: '', cp_value: '', trestbps_value : '', chol_value: '', fbs_value: '', restecg_value: '', thalach_value: '', exang_value: '', oldpeak_value: '', slope_value: '', ca_value: '', thal_value: '' } } onsubmitpredict = () => { fetch('http://127.0.0.1:1812/predict',{ method: 'POST', headers: {'content-type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ age: this.state.age_value, sex: this.state.sex_value, cp: this.state.cp_value, trestbps: this.state.trestbps_value, chol: this.state.chol_value, fbs: this.state.fbs_value, restecg: this.state.restecg_value, thalach: this.state.thalach_value, exang: this.state.exang_value, oldpeak: this.state.oldpeak_value, slope: this.state.slope_value, ca: this.state.ca_value, thal: this.state.thal_value }) }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data =>{ console.log(data) const output = data}) // console.log(JSON.stringify({ // age: this.state.age_value, // sex: this.state.sex_value, // cp: this.state.cp_value, // trestbps: this.state.trestbps_value, // chol: this.state.chol_value, // fbs: this.state.fbs_value, // restecg: this.state.restecg_value, // thalach: this.state.thalach_value, // exang: this.state.exang_value, // oldpeak: this.state.oldpeak_value, // slope: this.state.slope_value, // ca: this.state.ca_value, // thal: this.state.thal_value // })) } componentDidMount() { fetch('http://127.0.0.1:1812/') .then(Response => Response.json()) .then(console.log) } render() { return (
{this.setState({age_value:Event.target.value})}}>
{this.setState({sex_value:Event.target.value})}}> {this.setState({sex_value:Event.target.value})}}>
{this.setState({cp_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({trestbps_value:Event.target.value})}}> {this.setState({trestbps_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({chol_value:Event.target.value})}}> {this.setState({chol_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({fbs_value:Event.target.value})}}> {this.setState({fbs_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({restecg_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({thalach_value:Event.target.value})}}> {this.setState({thalach_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({exang_value:Event.target.value})}}> {this.setState({exang_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({oldpeak_value:Event.target.value})}}> {this.setState({oldpeak_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({slope_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({ca_value:Event.target.value})}}>

{this.setState({thal_value:Event.target.value})}}>
); } } export default App;
